content: @WG-prioritization the agenda is now ready, please check it out and feel free to improve it if you want https://hackmd.io/jK5Cm8QJSGG7ukq7lVilLg?both
we went over the full process of creating the agenda with @apiraino, also with the idea to improve a bit more the process
we would need to discuss a bit with @apiraino if we see something improvable here :)
we've just made a small PR to our procedure https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-forge/pull/405

Even though https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/issues/332 was filed as a MCP, it's actually under going FCP so I'm going to move it to that section (so we can remind people to check their boxes)
reviewed the above PR and submitted a follow-up PR with minor fixes: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-forge/pull/406
